control.enable:
#!/system/bin/sh

if [ $(cat /sys/module/max17048_battery/parameters/force_default_temp) = N ]
then
  echo 0
else 
  echo 1
fi
control.title: Force Good Battery Temp
control.description: Spoofing of battery temperature. This is useful if your battery temp reads wrong, in example: swapped battery, damaged cable or used 2-wire connection. In this case controller reads -30Â°C and can not charge battery because of Cold state. Wait a minute to apply value.
